Cranston.Roger Williams Park Zoo:
The Roger Williams Park Zoo of Providence, Rhode Island, United States is home to over 150 rare and fascinating animals from around the world in naturalistic settings. In 1986, Roger Williams Park Zoo became the first Zoo in New England to earn accreditation from the Association of Zoos and Aquariums.
The zoo was founded in 1872, and is one of the oldest zoos in the nation.
